set.name: DM22-SP2 Dragon Emperor of Booming Flame: Invitation from the Raging Dragon Count

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ 'Civil Count 4': If you have a total of 4 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-SP2 Dragon Emperor of Booming Flame: Invitation from the Raging Dragon Count

Set
property.value: DM22-SP2 Dragon Emperor of Booming Flame: Invitation from the Raging Dragon Count

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ 'Civil Count' 3: If you have 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, this creature gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-SP2 Dragon Emperor of Booming Flame: Invitation from the Raging Dragon Count

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". {SHIELD SAVER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost.)
